doc.field: Subseries III.A contains general office files, files kept by BJK on individual colleagues and public figures, and files on particular organizations and institutions. General files include BJK's address books, daily calendars, and letterhead. Notable individuals with a personal subject file include Hillary Clinton, tennis player Althea Gibson, Elton John, Charles Schulz, and BJK's first tennis coach Clyde Walker. Subject files on particular organizations include event programs and notes. Notable organizations with a subject file include the BJK Leadership Initiative, founded in 2014 by BJK and Ilana Kloss, the Women's Sports Foundation, founded by BJK in 1974, and the Women's Tennis Association, formed by BJK in 1973. Material dates from the 1950s-2018.
Series III. Subject files >> Subseries III.A. General subject files
